body_html: FYI, an internal contribution has resulted in the following functionality being added: vars_to_warm_start can now be "a function returning a boolean indicating whether a variable should warm-started. This function will be called for each item returned by tf.get_collection(GLOBAL_VARIABLES)". This makes selecting non-trainable variables (like batch-norm) much easier.
body_text: FYI, an internal contribution has resulted in the following functionality being added:  vars_to_warm_start can now be "a function returning a boolean indicating whether a variable should warm-started. This function will be called for each item returned by tf.get_collection(GLOBAL_VARIABLES)".  This makes selecting non-trainable variables (like batch-norm) much easier.
body: FYI, an internal contribution has resulted in the following functionality being added:  vars_to_warm_start can now be "a function returning a boolean indicating whether a variable should warm-started. This function will be called for each item returned by `tf.get_collection(GLOBAL_VARIABLES)`".  This makes selecting non-trainable variables (like batch-norm) much easier.
